p: α-Terpineol, β-phellandrene, and eucalyptol were purchased from Sigma Aldrich (99% pure), while the antibiotic cocktail DENT ® (SR014E), which is selective for H. pylori (HP) growth, was purchased from Oxoid, USA and contained 10 mg/mL vancomycin; 5 mg/mL cefsulodin; 5 mg/mL amphotericin B and 5 mg/mL trimethoprim. Other antibiotic stocks used were 100 mg/mL ampicillin and 12.5 mg/mL tetracycline, both from Sigma Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA).
